name: @ne1410s/dom
description: Lightweight ES5 script designed for inclusion in html and svg to simplify DOM operations

scripts.publish-local: npm run test && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.publish-patch: npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-minor: npm run test && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-major: npm run test && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public
